Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that Donald Trump said he will deport all Nigerians if he gets elected president. The provided evidence shows that this quote is fictional and falsely attributed to Trump.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no credible evidence or recorded quote from Donald Trump stating that he would deport all Nigerians.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Donald Trump has made a statement about deporting all Nigerians, which is not supported by any credible sources.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the quote attributed to Donald Trump is fictional and has been debunked by fact-checking sources.
Exist alternative explanation: An alternative explanation is that the claim is based on a fake quote that circulated online, which was not actually said by Donald Trump.
